author: Yuras Karmanau, Jim Heintz, Vladimir Isachenkov
title: Putin puts nuclear forces on high alert, escalating tensions
description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — President Vladimir Putin dramatically escalated East-West tensions by ordering Russian nuclear forces put on high alert Sunday, while Ukraine's embattled leader agreed to talks with Moscow as Putin's troops and tanks drove deeper into the…
